sections.title: 1. Data Processing Consent
sections.content: By submitting the form, you consent to the processing of your personal data in accordance with our privacy policy. We undertake to use your data solely for processing your request.

sections.title: 2. Responsibility
sections.content: All information you provide must be accurate. The administration is not responsible for any consequences arising from providing incorrect or false information.

sections.title: 3. Feedback
sections.content: We strive to respond to all inquiries as soon as possible. Response time may vary depending on the workload. If you have urgent questions, please contact us by phone.

notFound.title: Page Not Found

content.p1: The juice and beverage bottling shop is equipped with modern high-tech lines that carry out the process from the preparation of fruit juices and nectars to packaging. The lines are fully automated. The annual production capacity is 5,000 tons of finished products.
content.p2: The enterprise is certified according to the FSSC 22000 food safety and quality management system by SGS (Switzerland). Internal quality control procedures ensure:
content.li1: Ensuring the reliability and consistency of organoleptic indicators;
content.li2: Full inspection of each batch of products to ensure consumer satisfaction with the quality in the future;
content.li3: Compliance with all sanitary and hygienic standards and requirements;
content.li4: Control over the production process on the production lines;
